data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Anibare.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anibare, Nauru
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Anibare, Nauru to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Anibare.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Anibare.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Anibare
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Anibare, Anibare, Nauru.
Father, help the 38 believers in Anibare to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Anibare, Nauru.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Anibare, Nauru.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.
